modName: Whiterun House Guards - V9 - Imperials or Stormcloaks - New Version
summary:
This mod making your house defensed by special Guards that will kill all of your enemies!
The mod is also adding a huge basement under the house, with prison, dining room, 4 powerful followers & much more!
descriptionHtml:
[size=+3][b]Version 9 Update news![/size][/b] 
*Blocked entrance to Imperial Basement has fixed
*Major & Minor bug fixing
*Some minor improvements
*Stormcloak basement has a jail guard right now.

[size=+2][b]Requirements:[/size][/b] 
[size=+1][b]The game is must to be in version 8 (1.5.24) ![/size][/b]
if you will not update your game, the mod will make the game crash !

[size=+2][b]Notes[/size][/b] 
Installation help in the readme file inside the downloads.

[u]Known Issues:[/u]
0. None right now. Please report in the comments page !


[IMG]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/157/skyrimmodcomingsoon.png[/IMG]

When I\'ll reach 2222 downloads and 44 endorsements ill add guards to another city.
Want to choose your own city? Vote now in a comment !

[IMG]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/693/skyrimmodnews.png[/IMG]

[size=+2][b]New! Stormcloak guards availble right now ![/size][/b] 

Now call your guards from the sons of Skyrim - The Stormcloak, A fully designed Stormcloak basement with all the guards, followers and items !

[IMG]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/148/skyrimmoddescription.png[/IMG]

What is the mod adding ?

[size=+2][i]-- Breezehome [Whiterun] --[/size][/i]

[size=+1][b]Outside the house[/size][/b]

*2 Guards defensing the door of the house
*2 Archers Guards defensing you from the roof\'s balcony with high range shooting ability
*3 Imperial/Stormcloak flags on the front of the house, 2 on the archer\'s balcony & one more in the left side.

[size=+1][b]Inside the house:[/size][/b]
* Adding few imperial decorations and flags
* Adding huge secret [b]basement[/b]*

[size=+1][b]The Basement:[/size][/b]
* 1 Super powerful legate, can be a follower !
* 3 Imperial Guards Followers with uniqe names.
[size=+1][b]Basement\'s places and rooms:[/size][/b]
* Basement enterance, With big table with the imperial legion map and big potions cabinet.
* Guards residence, With 2 tables with food and fireplace with two food making stands with chairs with also box with guards clothes near every bed.
* Legate Golani\'s room, With big bed, safe with a lot of money, and more [Requires Golani\'s Key]
* Dining room, An amazing designed dining room, with many food from all Skyrim. (some times you may see your guards sitting together and eating there.
* Kitchen, Enterance from the dining room, with fireplace and food making stand, with huge food storage.
* Imperial prison, a big prison with 2 prisoners, the place is stifling because of the fireplace that keeping the deep place warmer.


[IMG]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/1043/skyrimmodquestions.png[/IMG]


1.
Q: Do I have to purchase an upgrades to my house to get the guards and furnishes ?
A: *Not yet*, but soon you will get your guards only after talking to the Legate of the Jarl.

2.
Q: If I commit a crime near one of my guard, will he do something for me ?
A: No, On the contrary, he will help you with anything ! no matter what you do !

3. 
Q: If im attacking a Imperial guard for example, in Solitude, Does my guards will attack me ?
A: No, Again they will always be in your side ! Even if u killing Tullius !

4.
Q: If one of my guard has been killed ?
A: He cant, They are unkillable.


You question not appear here ? Go to my mod page in Skyrim Nexus and write a comment !

[IMG]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/718/israelflagp.jpg[/IMG]
author: Eden Gallant

files.name: Version 8 - You choose Imperial or Stormcloak
